title.2: Tandem - Electric Bicycle Built for Two

desc.1: Pedego batteries are made with premium brand name lithium-ion cells supplied by the top manufacturers LG, Panasonic, and Samsung all meeting UL2580 compliance.
desc.2: Enjoy Supercharged performance for two. The Tandem is famous for its industry-leading range and breathtaking power.
desc.3: SMALL DETAILS MAKE A BIG DIFFERENCE. Every Pedego is lovingly designed in California with you in mind. They are crafted with select, premium quality components from the ground up. Small details make a big difference, and when you ride a Pedego, you can tell that we really care.
desc.4: The Stretch empowers you to haul people and stuff with ease. It comes standard with useful cargo accessories to carry loads of all shapes and sizes. You can easily carry kids and grown-ups with optional accessories.
desc.5: Express yourself with stylish designs. Prevent your stuff from being scratched or damaged. Convenient storage pockets for smaller items. Compatible with all Pedego baskets. Aluminum Basket version converts to a hand bag for easy carrying.
desc.6: Every Pedego is lovingly designed in California with you in mind. They are crafted with select, premium quality components from the ground up. Small details make a big difference, and when you ride a Pedego, you can tell that we really care.
desc.7: Weather resistant polyesters cover with reflective Pedego Logo. Bike Cover storage bag included. Securing straps and buckles.
desc.8: Playful designer bells to customize your Pedego.

Home.welcomeSubtitle: The best electric bike is the one that fits you best.
